text: The Lifan 720 is a four-door mid-size sedan produced by the Lifan Motors division of Lifan Group. == Overview == Lifan 720 rear Launched in 2012 at the Guangzhou Auto Show with a price of 79,800 yuan, it is powered by a 4-cylinder engines 1.8 L engine producing 128 hp and a torque of 168N·m. ==References== ==External links== *Lifan Motors website 720 Lifan 720 Category:Mid-size cars Category:Sedans Category:2010s cars Category:Cars of China
title: Lifan 720
